
## Description
As a team, we need to perform accessibility testing so that we can ensure our feature is ready for release. 

## Tasks
- [ ] Create an accessibility ticket/artifact using this [template](https://github.com/department-of-veterans-affairs/va.gov-team/issues/new?assignees=briandeconinck&labels=a11y-testing&template=a11y-testing.yaml&title=Accessibility+Testing+for+%5BTeam+Name%2C+Product+Name%2C+Feature+Name%5D)
- [ ] Complete & check-off each test in the ticket
